recipe.title: Spumante-Vodka Cocktail with Lemon Sorbet
instructions: Spoon frozen sorbet into blender. Add spumante, vodka, and whipping cream. Blend until smooth, about 1 minute. divide among 6 champagne flutes or wine glasses and serve.
